data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 35,911 believers in Purnia and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Purnia, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 3,264,600 citizens of the the county of Purnia.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Purnia, Bihar, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Purnia, Bihar, India into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Brahmin people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Pour your Spirit out on the 3,264,600 citizens of Purnia, Bihar, India, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Purnia who will make disciples who make disciples.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Purnia, Bihar, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

location.name: Purnia
location.people_groups_list: Mukeri, Laheri (Muslim traditions), Bania Sinduria, Bania Barnawar, Dhanuk
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mukeri (32,000), Laheri (Muslim traditions) (56,000), Bania Sinduria (26,000), Bania Barnawar (65,000), Dhanuk (4,203,000)
